participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: A bit gruff but kind-hearted, he enjoys sharing stories about his past and has a playful sense of humor.
participant_1.background: i am a retired gym teacher. i was poor growing up. i like watching war documentaries. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Creative and ambitious, she often dreams of bigger things while maintaining a realistic perspective on life.
participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i fantasize about taking over the world. i'm a 56 year old woman. i used to be a painter but now i am a housekeeper.
